title: A Young Boy Found Older Brothers in the Beatles
sub_head: Joe Peppercorn turned his gratitude for the band into an annual marathon of their music.
body:
Once in a while, when the stars are aligned just right in the night sky, life can become a beautiful song.
Iâ€™ve known Joe Peppercorn and his family for almost 10 years. He works as a bartender at restaurants around central Ohio and is the head of the choir program at the church where he worships with his wife, Juliette, a schoolteacher, and their three children.
